attributes.action: ensure car manufacturers warranties are still valid when bio fuels are used
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ensure that people are encouraged to use bio fuels as much as possible by not allowing car manufacturers to invalidate warranties .This is a simple and easy way to help the environment and only requires the political will to do so . There has been no proof that the use of bio fuels is harmful to car engines and many other countries have been using them in certain vehicles ,as standard for decades .Let's move into the 21st century and help the planet also !
